name: Word Globe
description:
Word Globe™ is an original word puzzle game that introduces a unique and fun game play that never existed before!

Why Word Globe™?

-Take a break and escape your routine with our very addicting and time killer puzzles.

-Brain storming, mind refreshing and educational word puzzles that will add a lot of new words to your vocabulary.

-Enjoy 500 original, manually made and hand crafted puzzles (Up to 3000+ puzzles under development).

-Read the descriptions and meaning of thousands of words as you play.

-Unique and dazzling game-play theme every 10 levels.

-Start your journey through our game map with various spectacular realms of the globe.

-Use our in-game and fun to use helpers like HINTS and the original and new GUESS helper for the ultimate word game experience.

-Enjoy our daily rewards and earn more coins each day.

-Why not try our Spinning Wheel … Who knows!! You may get lucky.

-Watch out for the Movements Counter to reserve your place among the top list of the leaders board with its exponential scoring mechanism.

-Don’t lose your progress and login with your Facebook account to save your progress and sync it when needed.

-Never miss our shop offers with its ad-free and coin packages.

HOW TO PLAY
-Swipe columns up and down.
-Form words in the highlighted row.

*Follow us on Facebook to stay up to date!
